title: Top 10 favourite albums
desc: List of my top 10 favourite albums of all time ★★★

title: Longest albums I've listened to
desc: List of the longest albums that i have listened to in full, requirements are just that it be 3 hours or longer, singles that are also over 3 hours (hello bull of heaven) are also included because i dont see why they shouldnt be, will be updated when i listen to something new longer than 3 hours
